channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Youzify
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Youzify

item.title: CVE-2023-0059|2024-08-02T04:54:32.622Z -- unknown -- youzify
item.description: The Youzify WordPress plugin before 1.2.2 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
